TITLE: Episode 140 - "Bring Out Your Dead!" with G-Dubya
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by the very gracious G-Dubya. He's an embalmer, autopsy tech, and a video game collector. We're going to pick his brain about the reality of death, working with dead people, and what it takes to do his job. Join us!
